WORK EXPERIENCE  
 
March  2022 - Present  Vink Chemicals  GmbH                                           Germany /Dubai  
   Strategy &  Business development manager (Middle East , Africa  & Asia Pacific)  
 
• Develop ed market specific  business  and growth strategies including  pricing  and sales strategies to 
promote biocides and speciality chemicals  within Asia Pacific  and the Middle East.   
 
• Conducted training  programs  on technical biocides  for distributor and partner teams  online and in 
person , by travelling to different countries with significant business potential. The se countries 
include Thailand, Singapore , Mal aysia, Taiwan, Australia, Kuwait, Saudi Arabia, Philippines, 
Cambodia , Dubai . The training included coaching  teams on the industrial specific applications of 
products across various industries including paint and coatings , construction, lubricant,  and metal 
working fluids , adhesives, paper,  and pulp, marine  and ink , system cleaning, oil and gas  and water 
treatment . 
 
• Expanded our clientele  in various markets through frequent customer visits to offer personalised 
solutions  and technical consulting services . This was achieved  by understanding the customers’  
needs and pain points and then selecting and recommending  products from our portfolio t hat fit their 
requirement s. 
 
• Conduct ed thorough research  which includ ed identifying markets trends , and big volume potential 
customers, insights on customer needs, finding new growth opportunities, trends, partnerships, 
products and services and new ways of reaching existing markets.  
 
• Organised seminars for key customers  and potential new local and multinational customers , 
educating them on industry speci fic product portfolio s, microbiology services, regulatory trends and 
support personalised services offered by  the company.  
 
• Form ed strategic partnerships that open ed business opportunities  and pathways  within  new markets  
of Japan and Korea , whilst achieving market growth of 15% in key markets like Thailand in 2023.  
Achieved  an overall growth  of 22% for the company by achieving  growth in my responsible regions.  
 
• Built long-term relationships with new and existing customers  by attending  key conferences around 
the world like ADEPEC Oil & Gas conference in Abu D

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
